def start_recording(self, filename: str) -> None:
        self.asciinema_proc = subprocess.Popen(
            [
                "asciinema",
                "rec",
                "-y",
                "--overwrite",
                "-c",
                "tmux attach -t asciinema_recorder",
                filename,
            ]
        )
        self.pause(1.5)
        self.record_start = time.time()
